A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fan\, this was an absolute joy to watch. It struck the perfect balance between paying homage to the original classics\, while generating new ideas\, plots\, and concepts to continue driving the story forward. I loved the much-needed diversity and representation of strong female leaders. We laughed\, we cried\, and we were on the edge of our seats the entire time. It was truly unforgettable and we are already planning to see it again!
